channel.title: Links on Coding notes - and snippets
channel.description: Recent content in Links on Coding notes - and snippets

item.title: Technical Reading List - Essential Developer Resources
item.description: Containers and Unix The container is a lie - Deep dive into how containers actually work at the OS level. ASP.NET Core Hosting on IIS with ASP.NET Core 2.2 - InProcess vs OutOfProcess hosting models. .NET Core compilation and packages - Understanding .NET Core primitives. Microservices How to cut microservices - Practical approach to service boundaries. Monolith to microservices summary - Migration strategies and patterns. Java and Scala Download and install JDK 11 on Windows - Java, JRE, and JDK setup guide.

item.title: JMeter Command Line and Dashboard Reports
item.description: Running JMeter from Command Line Execute tests in non-GUI mode for better performance: jmeter -n -t test-plan.jmx -l results.jtl Key parameters: -n - Non-GUI mode -t - Test plan file -l - Results log file Generating Dashboard Reports Option 1: Generate During Test Execution jmeter -n -t test-plan.jmx -l results.jtl -e -o /path/to/output/folder Additional parameters: -e - Generate report after test -o - Output folder for dashboard Option 2: Generate from Existing Results jmeter -g results.
